Uses of Package
it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game

  • Packages that use it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game 
    Package Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game  
    it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board  
    it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Effect  
    it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network  
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game used by it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game 
    Class and Description
    Action
    Action class represent the way for the client to ask the server to perform an action, so to move a family member on the board. follow this definitions an instance of the class Action contains all rhe information required by the server to perform all the necessary check on the validity of the move the client has asked for.
    ActionHandler
    class which is responsable of the handling of all the action performed by the clients.
    ContextManager
    ContextManager is responsable of handling the contexts.
    DiceColor
    enum which contains the color of dices used in the game.
    EndPhaseHandler
    class which handle the final score calculation, according to the game rules and the configuration file EndPhaseHandler.game: the Game of which the scores must be computed
    FamilyMember
    class representing a FamilyMember FamilyMember.diceColor: the color of this family memeber FamilyMember.actionValue: the action value of this family member.
    Game
    class Game is the core class of all the game.
    GameConfig
    singleton class which contains all the game configuration setting loaded from external JSON file during the Setup start phase.
    LeaderHandler
    class used to handle the first phase of the game in which the leader cards are distributed.
    MessageHandler
    class responsable of handling all the messages received, when Game recive a new message it is passed to one of the MessageHandler methods which will manage the processing of the message MessageHandler.game: the game handled by this instance of MessageHandler MessageHandler.board: the board of the game MessageHandler.turnManager: the turn manager of the game, required by the processing of TRNEND messages MessageHandler.memoryAction: HashMap which can be used to memorize the status of an action
    MoveChecker
    the main clas which perform the simulation of the action and assess if the action is valid or not.
    Player
    class which represent a Player.
    TurnManager
    class which hadle the turn mechanics TurnManager.game: the game which this instance of turn manager must handle TurnManager.period: the current period TurnManager.roundID: the current round TurnManager.turnID: the current turn TurnManager.update: if setted true the turn order must be updated TurnManager.turnOrderQueue: the queue containing the UUID of the players which represent the turn order TurnManager.memoryTurnOrder: get trace of the past turn order, is needed by updateTurnOrder() to update the turn order
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game used by it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board 
    Class and Description
